txt.en:
The sword-hilt appears to be of Westernesse-make, but the blade has been overlaid with writings in Black Speech. Among the dark writings, you can make out the name Kevoka.

You should take the blade to Nethraw at the Krúslë Lannan to the east of Gabilshathûr.

'Hail, [placeholder], it seems that you have brought me one of the swords that I desire!

'This is the sword of Kevoka. Long, he battled against the Witch-king, and he feigned peace and offered to him a truce. In his folly, he met at the appointed place alone and was captured. 

'When he returned to his people he was barely recognizable, a shadow of his former self. He served the Witch-king, and his people were taken into thralldom.'
You have recovered one of the seven swords of Krúslë Lannan.
Bring the Sword of Kevoka to Nethraw
Nethraw can be found at the Krúslë Lannan, east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nYou should bring the sword you found to Nethraw.
